channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Replacement Tree, 4th August
item.description:
Hello, The tree outside 36 Morgan Road was damaged and needed to be cut down. Please can a replacement tree be planted?
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lodes of nappy’s and rubbish up the side of number 1, 4th August
item.description:
There’s lodes of nappy’s rubbish broken glass up the side of number 1Arden close on public foot path and in the road this needs a litter pickup and road sweep on Arden close
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Redbourne Drive, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Plant trees,close victoria coach station down ,pedestrianise part of buckingham palace road, 4th August
item.description:
All residents at Fountain Court are suffering of anxiety sleepless nights and asthma attacks because of constant noise,idling engine noise from vehicles 24/7. Plant high trees to absorb poisonous car emissions,,to shade abd bring down high temperatures and also help with traffic noise reduction along Buckingham Palace Road in front of Fountain Court block now.Plan and focus on Coach closure and pedestrianise part of Buckingham Palace Road converting it to one way traffic.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Buckingham Palace Road, Belgravia, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very loud roadworks just outside flat, 4th August

item.title: Apples falling from tree hazzard, 4th August
